pullRequest.title: Log warning for variable values exceeding 32KB
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
To notify users that we discourage usage of big variable values we log a warning for variables which exceed 32KB
Related issues

closes #3891
Pull Request Checklist

 All commit messages match our commit message guidelines
 The submitting code follows our code style
 If submitting code, please run mvn clean install -DskipTests locally before committing

beforeCommit.message:
chore(engine): log warning when variable size exceeds 32KB

- to notify users that we discourage usage of big variable values we log a
  warning for variables which exceed 32KB

afterCommit.message:
chore(elasticsearch-exporter): log warning if variable exceeds size limit

- add configuration to ignore variables above which will lead to a warning
  message in the log that the variable is ignored by elasticsearch indexing
